data.comment: The match has started at Camp Nou.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 2, Jesus Gil Manzano awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sevilla's half?
Sevilla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Sevilla at Camp Nou.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
In Barcelona Sevilla attack through Lucas Ocampos. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 6, Sevilla drive upfield and Lucas Ocampos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Barcelona defender.
Throw-in Barcelona.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
In the minute 8, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Luuk De Jong.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Philippe Coutinho.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 13, Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Barcelona.
In the minute 15, Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick Barcelona.
In Barcelona Barcelona drive forward through Jordi Alba. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
In the minute 18, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sevilla in Barcelona.
Throw-in for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
In the minute 19, Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Barcelona's Antoine Griezmann gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Sevilla at Camp Nou.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Barcelona to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Barcelona throw-in in Sevilla's half.
Ansu Fati of Barcelona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Sevilla are pushing forward but Suso's finish is wide of the goal.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Barcelona a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Sevilla.
In the minute 37, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Barcelona.
Barcelona's Ansu Fati breaks free at Camp Nou. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Sevilla have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Barcelona to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Sevilla are caught offside.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Barcelona are coming forward and Lionel Messi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Sevilla a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Camp Nou.
The second-half is underway at Camp Nou.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Sevilla.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
In the minute 49, Antoine Griezmann gets his shot on target but fails to score for Barcelona.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Barcelona.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick Barcelona.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
In the minute 54, Joan Jordan of Sevilla gets in a strike, but is off target.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sevilla's half?
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Can Barcelona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sevilla's half?
In the minute 61, Trincao is replacing Antoine Griezmann for the home team.
The home team replace Ansu Fati with Pedri.
Julen Lopetegui (Sevilla) is making a first substitution, with Munir El Haddadi replacing Suso.
In the minute 61, Youssef En-Nesyri is replacing Lucas Ocampos for Sevilla at Camp Nou.
Free kick for Sevilla in the half of Barcelona.
Throw-in Barcelona.
In the minute 66, Sevilla have a dangerous throw-in.
Ivan Rakitic for Sevilla gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Sevilla.
Jules Kounde (Sevilla) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Sevilla.
Jules Kounde's header is off-target for Sevilla.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
In the minute 70, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Free kick Sevilla.
In the minute 72, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Barcelona throw-in in Sevilla's half.
Throw-in Sevilla.
Youssef En-Nesyri (Sevilla) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jordi Alba.
In the minute 75, Barcelona make their third substitution with Miralem Pjanic replacing Philippe Coutinho.
Sergino Dest (Barcelona) has replaced the possibly injured Jordi Alba at Camp Nou.
Can Barcelona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 77, Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Miralem Pjanic (Barcelona) has received a yellow card from Jesus Gil Manzano.
Nemanja Gudelj is on a sub for Ivan Rakitic for Sevilla.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Barcelona's Lionel Messi is on target but unsuccessful.
Sevilla needs to be cautious. Barcelona have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 82, In Barcelona Barcelona attack through Frenkie De Jong. The finish is off target, however.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Barcelona a goal kick.
Sevilla's Joan Jordan misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Oliver Torres is on a sub for Joan Jordan for Sevilla.
The away team replace Luuk De Jong with Oscar.
In the minute 85, Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Barcelona.
In the minute 87, Sevilla's Nemanja Gudelj has been booked in Barcelona.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Sevilla at Camp Nou.
Barcelona pushes forward through Trincao, whose finish on goal is saved.
Important block from the Sevilla defence as Sergi Roberto fires in a strike for Barcelona.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lionel Messi of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sevilla goal kick.
Ball safe as Barcelona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sevilla's half?
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
